summary: Jimmy Wayne "Jimi" Jamison  was an American rock vocalist and songwriter.
full_text: Jimmy Wayne "Jimi" Jamison  was an American musician, singer, and songwriter. He had previously been a member of the platinum-selling rock band Survivor. He was also a member of the band Cobra. Jamison is also known for writing and performing the theme song to Baywatch.
title: Jimi Jamison
